title: Solving the inverse grating problem by white light interference Fourier scatterometry
title_cn: 用白光干涉傅里叶散射法解决反光栅问题
abstract: Scatterometry is a well-established, fast and precise optical metrology method used for the characterization of sub-lambda periodic features. The Fourier scatterometry method, by analyzing the Fourier plane, makes it possible to collect the angle-resolved diffraction spectrum without any mechanical scanning. To improve the depth sensitivity of this method, we combine it with white light interferometry. We show the exemplary application of the method on a silicon line grating. To characterize the sub-lambda features of the grating structures, we apply a model-based reconstruction approach by comparing simulated and measured spectra. All simulations are based on the rigorous coupled-wave analysis method.
abstract_cn: 散射法是一种成熟的，快速且精确的光学计量方法，用于表征亚λ周期特征。 通过分析傅立叶平面，通过傅立叶散射法，无需任何机械扫描就可以收集角分辨衍射谱。 为了提高此方法的深度灵敏度，我们将其与白光干涉仪结合使用。 我们展示了该方法在硅线光栅上的示例性应用。 为了表征光栅结构的亚λ特征，我们通过比较模拟光谱和实测光谱来应用基于模型的重建方法。 所有的仿真都是基于严格的耦合波分析方法。

title: Integrated photonic systems based on transformation optics enabled gradient index devices
title_cn: 基于具有转换光学功能的梯度指数设备的集成光子系统
abstract: Integrated photonics is expected to play an increasingly important role in optical communications, imaging, computing and sensing with the promise for significant reduction in the cost and weight of these systems. Future advancement of this technology is critically dependent on an ability to develop compact and reliable optical components and facilitate their integration on a common substrate. Here we reveal, with the utility of the emerging transformation optics technique, that functional components composed of planar gradient index materials can be designed and readily integrated into photonic circuits. The unprecedented design flexibility of transformation optics allows for the creation of a number of novel devices, such as a light source collimator, waveguide adapters and a waveguide crossing, which have broad applications in integrated photonic chips and are compatible with current fabrication technology. Using the finite-difference time-domain method, we perform full-wave numerical simulations to demonstrate their superior optical performance and efficient integration with other components in an on-chip photonic system. These components only require spatially-varying dielectric materials with no magnetic properties, facilitating low-loss, broadband operation in an integrated photonic environment.
abstract_cn: 集成光子技术有望在光通信，成像，计算和传感领域发挥越来越重要的作用，并有望显着降低这些系统的成本和重量。这项技术的未来发展至关重要地取决于开发紧凑而可靠的光学组件并促进其集成在普通基板上的能力。在这里，我们揭示了利用新兴的转换光学技术的实用性，可以设计由平面梯度折射率材料组成的功能组件，并将其轻松集成到光子电路中。转换光学器件前所未有的设计灵活性允许创建许多新颖的设备，例如光源准直仪，波导适配器和波导交叉器，它们在集成光子芯片中具有广泛的应用并与当前的制造技术兼容。使用有限差分时域方法，我们进行了全波数值模拟，以证明其卓越的光学性能以及与片上光子系统中其他组件的有效集成。这些组件只需要空间变化的电介质材料而没有磁性，从而可以在集成光子环境中实现低损耗，宽带运行。
